recurring_interval.description: The recurring interval of the product. If `None`, the product is a one-time purchase.

recurring_interval_count.description: Number of interval units of the subscription. If this is set to 1 the charge will happen every interval (e.g. every month), if set to 2 it will be every other month, and so on. None for one-time products.
recurring_interval_count.title: Recurring Interval Count

trial_interval.description: The interval unit for the trial period.

trial_interval_count.description: The number of interval units for the trial period.
trial_interval_count.title: Trial Interval Count

product_id.description: The ID of the subscribed product.
product_id.title: Product Id

recurring_interval.description: The interval at which the subscription recurs.
recurring_interval.title: SubscriptionRecurringInterval

recurring_interval_count.description: Number of interval units of the subscription. If this is set to 1 the charge will happen every interval (e.g. every month), if set to 2 it will be every other month, and so on.
recurring_interval_count.title: Recurring Interval Count

seats.description: The number of seats for seat-based subscriptions. None for non-seat subscriptions.
seats.title: Seats

started_at.description: The timestamp when the subscription started.
started_at.title: Started At

trial_end.description: The end timestamp of the trial period, if any.
trial_end.title: Trial End

trial_start.description: The start timestamp of the trial period, if any.
trial_start.title: Trial Start
